statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_data;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_age < 30;
SELECT treatment_plan, blockchain_hash FROM healthcare_data WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, diagnosis FROM healthcare_data WHERE treatment_plan IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, treatment_plan FROM healthcare_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data ORDER BY patient_name ASC, patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, blockchain_hash FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_age < 25 OR diagnosis LIKE '%infection%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_health_condition FROM healthcare_data;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_health_condition='Diabetes' ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, block_timestamp FROM blockchain_audit;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_audit ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_health_condition FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_health_condition = 'Diabetes';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM healthcare_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_audit WHERE block_timestamp > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT block_id, block_hash FROM blockchain_audit WHERE block_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM healthcare_data WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM healthcare_data ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, audit_date, access_granted FROM data_privacy WHERE access_granted=true;
SELECT patient_id, hash_value, timestamp FROM blockchain_data WHERE patient_id=12345;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, admission_date FROM healthcare_data ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM healthcare_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM healthcare_data;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_records WHERE record_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, description, date_published FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE date_effective > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, dob, gender, address FROM patients WHERE gender='M';

SELECT patients.name, medical_records.diagnosis, blockchain_data.hash FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id INNER JOIN blockchain_data ON medical_records.record_id = blockchain_data.record_id;

SELECT patients.name AS patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis AS patient_diagnosis, regulatory_compliance.regulation_name AS compliance_regulation_name FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id INNER JOIN regulatory_compliance ON medical_records.record_id = regulatory_compliance.regulation_id;

SELECT patients.name, medical_records.diagnosis, regulatory_compliance.description FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id LEFT JOIN regulatory_compliance ON medical_records.record_id = regulatory_compliance.regulation_id;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data;
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM healthcare_data ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, medical_history FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM hospital_records WHERE record_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT block_id, hash, timestamp, data FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data WHERE dob >= '1980-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment, record_date FROM hospital_records WHERE patient_id = 5 ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT block_id, hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
